Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to providing notice to the crime victim or victim's representative that a parolee or releasee is being discharged or released
Summary: Requires the parole board to provide notice to the crime victim or victim's representative that a parolee or releasee is being discharged or released.
LawCode: Amd ยง259-j, Exec L; amd ยง410.90, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to providing notice to the crime victim or victim's representative that a parolee or releasee is being discharged or released
